Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
I have been doing some testing, and now I see that your concerns about performance issues is valid.

These properties (and others) will need some work to be considered a proper implementation from the perspective of a client.

I still think adding this is a good idea though, because it really does add a lot of functionality that people have been asking for.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I’m not entirely sure about this, but it may be worth investigating whether it is faster to send a single REPLACE call rather than repeated APPEND calls. I realize that it makes the code more complex, but this will significantly reduce context switches and processing overhead in the X11 server, I think.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: The comment is wrong, isn’t it? This only updates properties on the workspaces, not on managed windows, right?
